description: Are you ready for some football?
title: Throw the ultimate Falcons “homegating” party
text:
Are you ready for some football?
Atlanta is gearing up for the Falcons to take on the Seahawks this Saturday. If you haven’t scored seats to this divisional round playoff game, and plan to watch it at home, the NFL is selling the goods to help you throw the ultimate “homegating” party.
Falcons-branded cookware, drinkware, and serving pieces such as a football-shaped cutting board are available at NFLShop.com and at select Bed Bath & Beyond locations.
On NFLShop.com, you’ll find cookware, drinkware, serving pieces like an appetizer tray or a football-shaped cutting board, as well as home décor items, all bearing the Falcons logo.
Orders placed on qualifying products by Tuesday, Jan 10 are guaranteed to arrive by Friday, Jan. 13 or they are free. Visit NFLShop.com for details.
The products are also currently available at Bed Bath & Beyond store locations in Akers Mills, Cumming, Douglasville, John’s Creek, Lake Lanier, Mill Creek and Peachtree City.
